track.name: Lonesome Road
comments: Did they put something in the water in Athens Georgia, population 110,000- bands REM, B52's etc.
like you tomfarcie...i'm finding more music that i want to own since joining last.fm...
doce, e intenso como todo bom jazz, gostei muito de madeleine P.

I bought the whole album (Careless Road)   All the tracks are good!  :D   Funny, they thought we wouldn't buy music anymore if they let us stream it for free.  Yet, for me it's been quite the opposite. I've discovered so many genius tracks this way. Thanks LAST.FM .  You rule!  Keep up the good work :)
Yep, what a voice, and what a fine album Careless Love is!
beautiful song , very  sensitively performed  by all
adorei!!!!! nunca tinha ouvido tamanha afinação patabens......
me encanta ...me hace sentir que estoy en el cielo !!!!
